Another interesting choice is "True Blood", a drama featuring stellar performances from actors like Steve Buscemi and Michael Imperioli. It's not exactly an extraterrestrial life movie, but it's certainly worth watching for its gripping storyline!

If you're looking for a movie that shifts from the world of romance like Along Came Polly to something set in a more kitchen-centric environment, I would recommend "Saving Mr. Banks." This film tells a fascinating story about the author P.L. Travers and her journey with Walt Disney as they work together to bring Mary Poppins to the big screen. The star-studded cast, including Tom Hanks and Emma Thompson, delivers captivating performances that make for an enjoyable watch.

On the other hand, if you're looking for a more action-packed movie with a unique plot, "Velocity" might be just the thing for you. This film takes you inside the world of MotoGP racing, featuring intense motorcycle competition and a captivating storyline that goes beyond the sport. Actors like Matt Damon and Drew Barrymore lend their talents to this high-octane film.
